on cordova you MUST use document.addEventListener

trailingComments.value:
*
 * Host reachable make a simple HEAD request 
 * to location.hostname
 * with a param to disable the cache
 * @returns {Boolean}

leadingComments.value: Handle IE and more capable browsers

trailingComments.value: Open new request as a HEAD to the root hostname with a random param to bust the cache
